comments:
1. On "Grid Projects" view select folder "Filesysystems" and from context menu start "New Grid Connection"
2. Select scheme=file, type existing folder e.g. c:\temp
3. Press button Finish

- wizard is not closed

I just tested this issue and was not able to reproduce the problem. Nevertheless I found another problem that may be related to what you describe and was able to fix it. Mariusz, could you please have a look if this fix also solves your problem and let me know afterwards?

Maybe problem described by me occured only under windows.
I made test on g-eclipse with your changes, and now NullPointerException doesn't occur during creating local connection.
So I'm closing this bug.
Thanks for the confirmation -> closing this item
